Interface ITokenManagementService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TokenManagementService

    public interface ITokenManagementService
    The Interface ICaptureTokenService.
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Detail

      • setListener

        void setListener(ITokenManagementListener listener)
        Inject the ICaptureTokenListener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the token management events listener. This can be either an implementation of ITokenManagementListener or an extended instance of TokenManagementListenerAdapter.
        See Also:
        ITokenManagementListener, TokenManagementListenerAdapter

      • changeViewFinderFrameDimension

        boolean changeViewFinderFrameDimension(int startX,
                                     int startY,
                                     int frameWidth,
                                     int frameHeight)
                                       throws PaydiantClientException
        Set the viewFinderView frame dimensions, Default values will be assign for the incorrect and out of range dimension parameters.
        Parameters:
        startX - Starting position X coordinate
        startY - Starting position Y coordinate
        frameWidth - Width of the frame
        frameHeight - Height of the frame
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        PaydiantClientException - the paydiant client exception

      • stopCameraSession

        void stopCameraSession()
        Close & exit from the camera if exist.

      • startCameraSession

        void startCameraSession(ViewfinderView viewfinderView,
                      SurfaceView surfaceView)
        Setting up the viewfinderView & surfaceView with relevant callback methods.
        Parameters:
        viewfinderView - the viewfinder view
        surfaceView - the surface view

      • startCameraSession

        void startCameraSession(SurfaceView surfaceView)
        Setting up the surfaceView with relevant callback methods Make sure you have removed the SurfaceView object from the resource xml file Exclude viewfinderView.
        Parameters:
        surfaceView - the new up camera preview view

      • setCamaraConfigparms

        void setCamaraConfigparms(CameraConfigParameters camaraConfigparms)
        Setting up the camera configuration parameters.
        Parameters:
        camaraConfigparms - the new camara configparms

      • removeCaptureTokenListener

        void removeCaptureTokenListener()
        Remove the capture token listener and sets it to null.

                       int height,

        Obtain a checkout token

      • releaseCheckoutToken

        void releaseCheckoutToken(String checkoutTokenValue)
        Release checkout token

      • setCameraEventListener

        void setCameraEventListener(ICameraEventListener cameraEventListener)
        Registers an instance of ICameraEventListener to receive callbacks during camera events such as camera open, start preview, stop preview, release.
        Parameters:
        cameraEventListener - instance of ICameraEventListener. Setting a null value will deregister the event listener.
        Since:
        4.4.0.3
        See Also:
        ICameraEventListener
